reviewText: Mr. johnson's interpretation of a combination of ghostbuster meets grifter is original. i had fun watching his character peter campbell screw his female clients, fight demons with his cohorts while talking with a fake british accent part of the time throughout the movie.  you got to give john johnson credit he comes up with ideas that would be impossible to duplicate in the hollywood big budget arena.

A really fun filled flick from the folks of the D'Zone. John Johnson's ode to Ghostbusters hits you on all of the right levels and right places. John wrote, directed, and was one of the ensemble cast of this film. A great film to watch since you can see how much fun Darkstone had in making it.
